sentences.sContent: Moreno limped off the field with a foot injury.
sentences.sCn: 莫雷诺脚上受了伤，一瘸一拐地走出球场。

sentences.sContent: Young walked with a slight limp.

synos.tran: 跛行，一拐一拐地走；缓慢费力地前进

words.tran: 柔软地；四肢无力地，软绵绵地

trans.tranOther: to walk slowly and with difficulty because one leg is hurt or injured
a way of walking in which one leg is used less than normal because it is injured or stiff
